def-en: In the context of graphs, a grpah in which edges can connect 3+ nodes at once, instead of only two nodes.
def-ga: I gcomhthéacs graf, graf inar feidir le ceangail 3+ nód a cheangal san am céanna, seachas dhá nód amháin.
notes: Téarma cruthaithe go díreach as na fréamhacha thuas.
Féach chomh maith ar an téarma 'graph / graf'.
